channel.title: Tshark on warrick.io
channel.description: Recent content in Tshark on warrick.io

item.title: streams with tshark
item.description: Wiresharks command-line complement, tshark, is pretty handy in a jam. You can even extract stream numbers: $ tshark -r dump.pcap -T fields -e tcp.stream Using the stream numbers, you can be much more precise in your filters: $ tshark -r dump.pcap -T fields -e text tcp.stream eq $stream
